name: Lemongrass
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - herbs and spices
Aromatic herb used in Asian cuisine
benefits: Lemongrass is an aromatic herb that adds bright, citrusy flavor to dishes without adding salt or calories. It contains beneficial compounds with potential antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties. Using herbs and spices like lemongrass helps reduce reliance on added salt.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen herbs and spices, typically 1-2 stalks crushed

quotes: In a large pot, combine the Light Vegetable Broth, lemongrass, ginger and garlic. Bring to the boil, then lower the heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
